articles.title: Myanmar rejects UN resolution urging arms embargo - CNA
articles.description: BANGKOK: Myanmar’s Foreign Ministry on Saturday (Jun 19) rejected a UN General Assembly resolution calling for an arms embargo against the Southeast Asian nation and condemning the military's February seizure of power.

articles.description: Chinese actress Sabrina Qiu, director Wong Jing’s latest muse, says she tries to avoid comparisons with other actresses he has groomed such as Sharla Cheung Man, Shu Qi and Loletta Lee.
